alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:36PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sanpete...east central Millard and southeastern Juab Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 636 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Fillmore, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scipio, Fayette, Holden, Yuba Lake State Park and Greenwood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 169 and 203. US Route 50 between mile markers 108 and 142. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley
